description: I use it on my Linux desktop and Steam deck. It just works
summary: Works Great on Desktop and Steamdeck

description:
Im not an expert on the workings of gpu driver implementation but it has often broke the ability to use graphics enhancing plugins due to not updating any config settings
If theres an easier way to fix it than burning incense and latin prayers, i'd love to hear it or even better have the option made accessible to people who are less savvy with graphics drivers
summary: amazing app, but broken by driver updates easily

description:
The way to play with linux, using for months with no problem!
The company said that were impossible to do a linux native launcher, here we go again, the community doing what jagex can't.
Forget all the work arounds this app is a lifesaver. OSRS and OS3!
Great app, works well, updated regularly
no wine layers, just the jagex launcher running natively

Doesn't work. When trying to log in the Jagex site has a CloudFlare human detector and it's stuck in a loop. No matter how many times I click it, reinstall, reboot, update time zone, change default browsers, it never works.

Works perfectly and is much better than the official jagex launcher in my opinion. One small feedback I have is that it would be nice if you could set a background color or image so it isn't just a white window in my dark mode desktop.
Its not the prettiest laucher in the world but it doesn't have to be, it works right out of the box no problems.
So far nobody has hacked me, and it works!
So much better than wine hell

The UI is empty, but it does it's job just the same as the official launcher.
Verified for Steam Deck! Well done

Thank you for picking up Big J's slack. The launcher seems to work with absolutely no tweaks needed on Nobara. 


Using runelite scale 2.0 on a 2.8K display on my asus laptop. What a time to be alive.
summary: What a time to be alive

description: Works like a magic. Tested on Nobara.

I've been fighting with the Jagex Launcher for days on Nobara with no luck. Tried Lutris, tried other Flatpak packages for the official launcher. This is the only thing that has worked so far. 

I can't say how much I appreciate this.
Works great you can finally just download and start playing!
summary: Finally no more janky Lutris scripts that stop working every week

description: Quick and painless and allows me to play runescape on my steam deck
summary: Fantastic, does what it says on the tin

description: Jagex no longer allows you to play Runescape without using the Jagex Launcher. Thanks to this application, you can!
Works without any issue.
New to linux and just wanted to use RuneLite on my steam deck, works effortlessly and flawlessly!
i never write reviews butthis works great!
Works flawlessly, thanks man! It even works wth HDOS which I wasn't expecting.
no me deja entrar a la aplicacion
